greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the product over all prime powers p^e where p^e is the highest power of p dividing n and p-1 does not divide n.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
maple: A300330 := proc(n) local P, F, f, divides; divides := (a,b) -> is(irem(b,a) = 0):
P := 1; F := ifactors(n)[2]; for f in F do if not divides(f[1]-1, n) then
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Mar 12 2018
